title: Accelerating the Expansion of Machine Communications
itunes:title: Accelerating the Expansion of Machine Communications
description:
Samuel Reeves, CEO and Founder of Fort Robotics, discusses the close of a $25 million Series B funding round to accelerate the rollout of its machine communications platform.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Samuel Reeves, CEO and Founder of Fort Robotics, discusses the close of a $25 million Series B funding round to accelerate the rollout of its machine communications platform.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.
